response.overview: Step into the world where dreams are nurtured and aspirations take flight in inDoctornated.  From a freelance writer reflecting on his journey crafting stories for an inclusive theme park, to a scientist working to protect our environment, to an engineer building technology that saves decades worth of film, inDoctornated delves into the power of storytelling to ignite passions, change lives, and ultimately change the world.  Through candid interviews and personal anecdotes, inDoctornated celebrates the universal theme of finding purpose and making a difference. It captures the essence of a supportive community bound by shared inspiration and the belief that each person has the potential to create something meaningful.  inDoctornated invites audiences and fans of all kinds to reflect on the influence of media, the evolution of personal dreams, and the profound connections that unite us all in our quest for purpose and fulfillment.
response.tagline: Inspired fans saving the world their way.
response.title: inDoctornated
